name: Mercure Hotel Chateau

reviews.text: The hotel is located off the elegant Kufertendamstrasse. It is close to the U-Bahn, S-Bahn, and buses. The staff is very accommodating. My room, while not luxurious, was clean, comfortable, and spacious. Breakfast was adequate. There is a supermarket next door. I would certainly stay at the hotel the next time I visit Berlin.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: First, the location is excellent. It`s very close to the main shopping street Kurfürstendamm (Ku`damm). There are many restaurants nearby as well and there is a supermarket next door where you can buy drinks and snacks.
reviews.title: Disappointing Mercure Hotel with good location

reviews.text: The hotel is in a quiet side street off the Ku'damm, very close to an U-Bahn station, also buses nearby. And of course shopping! It's a good value, but nothing too great. The only thing that disturbed me were the chewing gum in the carpet next to my bed. I stepped into it all the time.
reviews.title: Fair price, good location & huge rooms

reviews.text: I booked a Privilege upgrade, but I didn't get any of the extra service with it. So at the end I managed to agree with the reception that I pay the normal price. So this was satisfactory way to sort out this hitch.
reviews.title: relatively average hotel, but convenient, clean & quiet

reviews.text: I didn't go for breakfast, but a friend of mine did and she was very satisfied, it was worth the price apparently. I prefer to sit outside in Cafes and up on the Knesebeckstrasse there are couple of nice places. Especially the lovely Cafe 1900.
reviews.title: Best week ever

reviews.text: I might consider coming back here again due to the good price-value of the hotel.
reviews.title: Better than we expected

reviews.text: This hotel is essentially what I expected for the money in Berlin. Actually, the price was quite fair. When you pay this much (or this little) for a hotel, you can't expect it to be a beautiful top-quality stay, but I was looking for clean and quiet. This I got. I will say that I had to change rooms a few times. The first room was at the end of the hallway and the wifi (free) signal was not strong enough to stay connected. The second room that they gave me was a smoking room and while it didn't reek, it was not terrifically pure smelling.
reviews.title: Quite good, but not great
